TextView.android:text: The Warrior is one of the five playable Classes in Wynncraft and uses a spear as its weapon. With a base armour rating of 120%, The Warrior is known for its outstanding defensive capabilities, with best defense out of all the 5 classes while packing considerable amounts of damage. It has multiple crowd control abilities, and depending on what Skill Points are invested where, the Warrior can play as a tank, brute, or juggernaut, though some people choose alternative paths such as a spellcaster or glass-cannon Warrior.
